bibl.note: Proceedings of a conference held Nov. 25-27, 2008, at the Netherlands-Flemish Institute in Cairo. - 30 contributions. - Part I. bibl.seg: Hans Barnard & Kim Duistermaat (edd.), The History of the Peoples of the Eastern Desert = University of California. Cotsen Institute of Archaeology. Monograph 73.
Los Angeles, University of California, 2012, 4°, xiv-506 pp., tabl., figg. ISBN 978-1-931745-96-3. $79.95.
